short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds links to the Steam games available for choice members

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works on pages where member choice games are available for redeem: https://www.humblebundle.com/membership/*.

The extension works without sending any outgoing requests to the steam api. It wraps the steam icon under the game details with a link to it's store page.
